code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MemberList(){const[members,setMembers]=useState([]);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);const navigate=useNavigate();const fetchData=async()=>{try{setIsLoading(true);const response=await fetch('/api/member');const data=await response.json();setMembers(data);setIsLoading(false);console.log(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);setIsLoading(false);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})});}const handleRefresh=()=>{fetchData();};const handleRowClick=id=>{navigate("member/".concat(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Member List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleRefresh,children:"Refresh"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{border:"1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date of Creation"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:members.map(member=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{onClick:()=>handleRowClick(member.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:member.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:member.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:member.dateOfCreation})]},member.id))})]})]});}export default MemberList;
